author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Arizona's Hair and Nail Salon Workers Call on Governor to Take Them Off List of Essential Services: 'Absolutely Ridiculous'
description: Governor Doug Ducey has issued a stay-at-home order for Arizona, but the list of essential businesses to remain open includes barber shops and salons.
content:
Arizona's hair and nail salon workers are calling on Governor Doug Ducey to take them off the list of businesses deemed essential amid the coronavirus pandemic.
On Monday, the Republican governor issued a stay-at-home order until April 30 to slow the spread … [+6471 chars]
